requirement_text:
As a patient, I want to be able to access my medical record from my mobile device so that I can review measurement and test results.
As a patient, I want to be able to share data which is collected through my wearable device(s) with healthcare professionals.
As a patient, I want to be able to control who has access to my medical data so that I can restrict access to my data if necessary.
As a patient, I want to be able to review the status of laboratory tests so that I have an indication of when the results will be available.
As a patient, I want to be able to schedule appointments so that I can remotely schedule appointments using my customer account.
As a patient, I want to be able to renew my medication prescriptions.
As a doctor, I want to be able to share patient data with both internal as well external laboratories.
As a doctor, I want to import measurement results into patients' medical records automatically, so that I don't have to enter these manually.
As a doctor, I want to be able to access patients’ medical records so that I can view all their relevant medical data.
As a doctor, I want to be able to add data to patients’ medical records.
As a doctor, I want to be able to have an agenda so that I can see who and where my next patient appointment is.
As a doctor, I want to be able to request laboratory tests so I can review the results of these tests.
As a doctor, I want to be able to send out prescriptions to pharmacies.
As a doctor, I want to be able to review what medications the pharmacies have in stock.
As a doctor, I want to be able to review the intake prescriptions of medications so I can advise my patients on their medication intake.
As a doctor, I want to have an overview of external pharmacies including their names, address and contact numbers.
As a doctor, I want to limit nurses' access to patient medical records, so that they do not accidentally remove important data.
As a doctor, I want to be able to review the status of laboratory tests so that I have an indication of when the results will be available.
As a doctor, I want to be able to attach notes to laboratory tests so that I can supply laboratory personnel with additional information if needed.
As a doctor, I want to be able to log in to the system quickly so that I don’t have to waste any time during patient appointments.
As a nurse, I want to be able to edit patient's’ medical record so that I can enter measurement results.
As a nurse, I want to review patient’s’ relevant medical information so that I can prepare their room accordingly.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to identify patients through a unique number.
As a receptionist, I want to have access to doctors’ schedule so that I can schedule their appointments.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to match patients to doctors so that I can schedule appointments for them.
As a receptionist, I want to have an overview of available rooms so that I can assign patients to them.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be have an overview of all tests that need to be performed.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to review the type and level of urgency for each test to be performed, as well as the doctor who has requested the test.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to receive notifications regarding requests for tests to be done so that I can perform tests when needed.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to enter test results so that doctors are able to review them.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to attach notes to laboratory tests so that I can supply doctors with additional information if needed.
As a pharmacist, I want to be able to review a patient's’ ID number, medication dosage and prescribed medication.
As a system administrator, I want to be able to adjust users’ access rights.
As a system administrator, I want to enforce two-step authentication for all users, so that system security is guaranteed.

use_cases.name: Manage Laboratory Tests
use_cases.description: Allow doctors and laboratory technicians to request tests, share patient data, track pending tests, review details, and enter laboratory results.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to share patient data with both internal as well external laboratories.
As a doctor, I want to be able to request laboratory tests so I can review the results of these tests.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be have an overview of all tests that need to be performed.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to review the type and level of urgency for each test to be performed, as well as the doctor who has requested the test.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to enter test results so that doctors are able to review them.

use_cases.name: Authenticate Users
use_cases.description: Provide secure user login with enforced two-step authentication for accessing the system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to log in to the system quickly so that I don’t have to waste any time during patient appointments.
As a doctor, I want to be able to log in to the system quickly so that I don’t have to waste any time during patient appointments.
As a system administrator, I want to enforce two-step authentication for all users, so that system security is guaranteed.

use_cases.name: Manage Prescriptions
use_cases.description: Enable creation, renewal, sending, and review of prescriptions along with related pharmacy stock and patient prescription details.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to renew my medication prescriptions.
As a doctor, I want to be able to send out prescriptions to pharmacies.
As a doctor, I want to be able to send out prescriptions to pharmacies.
As a doctor, I want to be able to review what medications the pharmacies have in stock.
As a doctor, I want to be able to review what medications the pharmacies have in stock.
As a doctor, I want to be able to review the intake prescriptions of medications so I can advise my patients on their medication intake.
As a doctor, I want to have an overview of external pharmacies including their names, address and contact numbers.
As a doctor, I want to have an overview of external pharmacies including their names, address and contact numbers.
As a pharmacist, I want to be able to review a patient's’ ID number, medication dosage and prescribed medication.

use_cases.name: Manage Medical Records
use_cases.description: Allow authorized users to access, review, edit, and enrich patient medical records with measurements and wearable data.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to access my medical record from my mobile device so that I can review measurement and test results.
As a patient, I want to be able to share data which is collected through my wearable device(s) with healthcare professionals.

user_stories.action: import measurement results into medical records
user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to import measurement results into patients' medical records automatically, so that I don't have to enter these manually.
As a doctor, I want to be able to access patients’ medical records so that I can view all their relevant medical data.
As a nurse, I want to be able to edit patient's’ medical record so that I can enter measurement results.
As a nurse, I want to review patient’s’ relevant medical information so that I can prepare their room accordingly.
As a doctor, I want to be able to add data to patients’ medical records.

use_cases.name: Schedule Appointments
use_cases.description: Support scheduling and managing appointments, doctor agendas, patient identification, doctor-patient matching, and room availability.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to schedule appointments so that I can remotely schedule appointments using my customer account.
As a doctor, I want to be able to have an agenda so that I can see who and where my next patient appointment is.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to identify patients through a unique number.
As a receptionist, I want to have access to doctors’ schedule so that I can schedule their appointments.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to match patients to doctors so that I can schedule appointments for them.
As a receptionist, I want to have an overview of available rooms so that I can assign patients to them.

use_cases.name: Annotate Laboratory Tests
use_cases.description: Enable users to attach notes to laboratory tests and notify laboratory staff of new test requests.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to attach notes to laboratory tests so that I can supply laboratory personnel with additional information if needed.
As a doctor, I want to be able to attach notes to laboratory tests so that I can supply laboratory personnel with additional information if needed.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to receive notifications regarding requests for tests to be done so that I can perform tests when needed.
As a laboratory technician, I want to be able to attach notes to laboratory tests so that I can supply doctors with additional information if needed.

use_cases.name: View Laboratory Test Status
use_cases.description: Allow users to check the current status and progress of laboratory tests.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to review the status of laboratory tests so that I have an indication of when the results will be available.
As a doctor, I want to be able to review the status of laboratory tests so that I have an indication of when the results will be available.

use_cases.name: Manage User Access Rights
use_cases.description: Allow administrators to configure and adjust users’ access rights in the system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a system administrator, I want to be able to adjust users’ access rights.

use_cases.name: Control Access to Medical Data
use_cases.description: Allow patients and doctors to define and restrict who can access specific medical records and data.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to control who has access to my medical data so that I can restrict access to my data if necessary.

user_stories.action: limit access to patient medical records
user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to limit nurses' access to patient medical records, so that they do not accidentally remove important data.
